content: And that I think, let me just say, I think it speaks to ADM's leadership position and understanding that if they want to partner with an organization that is investing as much in the next generation of seed development, specifically, to link farmer and consumer interest, their willingness to come to the table and to establish very much a win-win scenario with Benson Hill to achieve that, I think just speaks to the progressive nature of what's going on in that nutrition business and there is a strong alignment of how we're going to go to market together and really create some very synergistic value between the two organizations.
